notes.text:
This update for squid3 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-19131: Fixed Cross-Site-Scripting vulnerability in the TLS error handling (bsc#1113668).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Squid before 4.4 has XSS via a crafted X.509 certificate during HTTP(S) error page generation for certificate errors.
notes.title: CVE description
